name: Sourdough Bagel

variants.description: Poppy seed coated chewy bagels, fermented for 48 hours
variants.name: Sourdough Bagel - Poppy Seeds
Sourdough Bagels - Pack of 4
variants.description: Saver pack, get 4 bagels for the price of 3.

attributes.title: Ingredients
attributes.details: Organic bread flour, malt, salt and young rye starter. Optional: Poppy seeds.

attributes.title: Allergy Info
attributes.details: This product contains wheat and gluten. It may also contain traces of nuts.

attributes.title: Storage
attributes.details: Enjoy hot or toasted | Keep at room temperature for up to 2 days | For longer storage, place in zip-lock bags and keep in the freezer for up to 3 months | Bread should not be refrigerated | To serve from freezer, allow bread to thaw at room temp. and then refresh in 180c oven

attributes.title: Delivery
attributes.details: Sourdough bakery delivers Monday through Saturday of each week upon pre-order

description: New York style chewy bagels, fermented for 48 hours.
